changes.description: Updated status indicator section to use ExecutionState enum instead of config-based status strings
details: Replaced status badge logic with match on node.execution_state
Waiting: amber badge with clock icon
Running: blue badge with animated spinner (animate-spin class)
Succeeded: green/emerald badge with check-circle icon
Failed: red badge with x icon and error tooltip
Skipped: dimmed slate badge with x icon
Updated is_running check to use matches!(node.execution_state, ExecutionState::Running)

changes.description: Added icon mappings for execution state badges
details: Updated imports to include CheckCircleIcon, LoaderIcon, XIcon
